evenly onto needle 1 excess water by rolling the mittens inside a and 2 along the upper part of the thumb towel stretch to desired measures and let dry flat or on mitten blockers weave in the ends opening pick up 3 sts onto each needle there are now 11 12 13 sts on each needle attach mc and work in stockinette stitch until the tip of the thumb is almost covered abbreviations work the thumb tip
